website_summaries.verdict: A traditional-looking pergola on the smaller side that makes a convenient outdoor space.
pros: Traditional wooden construction is easy to put together in just a couple of hours
Thin posts offer plenty of space underneath the pergola for furniture
cons: Construction can feel flimsy in bad weather like wind and rain

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 55 year old woman who put this together by myself. It’s awesome. I did assemble the first of the square upside down and then flip it over. Then I added all the other parts. Holes are predrilled, you just need to carefully match them up. I also put wood post into the legs for stability. Concreted the legs into flower pots with 40 lbs in each pot. Looks like I have a room addition. So happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: ru

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble. I get a lot of complements on the pergola. My only complaint is that it is not as sturdy as I would like. I have firmly attached the base to my deck and there is still a lot of play in the pergola structure. It will sway side to side / front to back a couple of inches at the top when pressure is applied (or a good wind blows). I will at some point add angle bracket to attach one side to my home for additional support. I would recommend adding secured 4"x4" wooden posts at least 4' to 5' under the vinyl sleeves for support.
customer_reviews.author: SVox

customer_reviews.title: Transforms a blank space into a cozy corner
customer_reviews.text: This pergola is vinyl and very lightweight and easy to assemble. We cemented into flower pots to weight it down and also make it possible to move if necessary. We added SUNTHIN 48ft White Outdoor String Light Kit with 0.9W Dimmable LED Bulbs for Outdoor Weddings Lights, Commercial Patio String Lights, Backyard Lights and Party Light to add ambience and together with the Walsunny 7pcs Patio Outdoor Furniture Sets,Low Back All-Weather Rattan Sectional Sofa with Tea Table&Washable Couch Cushions (Black Rattan)(Blue) all from Amazon, we transformed an empty deck to a very peaceful escape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be holding up after a long time in service, I like to wait until I use something awhile before I rate it and this has been up for awhile. It still holding up good.
customer_reviews.author: TLJx2

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY sturdy and looks amazing over my hot tub! We originally set it up on a tiled patio and then moved it over to the hot tub several days later, so there was no anchoring during that time. We had several high wind storms come through those days (up to 60 mph wind gusts) and the pergola withstood it all beautifully. Of course, it is anchored down now in it's permanent positioning, but we were very pleased with how well it is made.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted shopper

customer_reviews.title: It was very beautiful and strong
customer_reviews.text: I used this pavilion to make melon sheds and harvested seven dozen pounds of wax gourd. It was very beautiful and strong.
customer_reviews.author: dana L

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. I am 77 and wife 72
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. I am 77 and wife 72, but did not have too much trouble. Main problem we have had thus far was the delivery. FedEX left it a our clubhouse (would not deliver to our unit and driver was complete a--.) Loaded it on our golf cart and toted it home. Neighbor helped unload to our driveway. Still need to finish mounting the anchoring brackets to driveway.
customer_reviews.author: Itz, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Looks much more expensive/fancy than it costs!
customer_reviews.text: This finished off the look to my backyard spa area. My dad put it together for me, so I can't comment on ease of assembly. I did let him know in advance there were a few reviews mentioning difficulty in assembly, but...he's an engineer and didn't have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: andorach

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade to our patio.
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly as we hoped. My husband & I did ourselves. He is 70, I am 63. It took us about 10 hours. We did have to buy bases since we put it on out concrete patio.
customer_reviews.author: Airhead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great pergola, easy to assemble. Had all its pieces parts, none missing, instructions clear -- Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great price and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great price and beautiful! I put this together in about 4 hours. Easy to understand instructions. I placed it on a deck. Customer service got me the correct mounting brackets. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: dla4507

customer_reviews.title: Works well in my yard and is cozy for group gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my sun shade sale canopy and it works great for keeping the sun at bay. Makes it very comfortable to sit underneath it at group gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a little over 4 years now and it has managed to withstand our harsh Chicago winters wonderfully. It still looks like the day it was installed. For the price, you really can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: books12345

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Good product at a reasonable price. It comes with everything you really need to erect and enjoy using the pergola.
customer_reviews.author: passenthru

customer_reviews.title: very pretty but not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: its okay but not the quality of another better brand that Amazon sells. It's just okay. Wish I'd spent more & gotten the other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kailani

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, looks great wife and I installed it,not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and looks great,very sturdy and should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: neal memoli

customer_reviews.title: Meets our needs!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service and we have received many compliments. We did get the base 'feet' at our local hardware store, for looks as well as stability. Worked out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: TWright

customer_reviews.title: Vinyl pergola
customer_reviews.text: I gave it only 4 stars, not because of the item itself, but because of my error with not researching to see if I could order a taller unit. The height is standard, and my home ceilings/doors/roof line in height are not standard.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lou

product_meta.title: Dura-Trel Queensbrook Pergola
product_meta.description:
Add a regal feel to your backyard by accessorizing it with the Dura-Trel Queensbrook Pergola. This generous structure turns any section of lawn into an outdoor room, for you to relax in your backyard for many seasons. Four, white vinyl posts create a 90" square footprint, and perfectly support the top beams. Several slats rest perpendicularly atop these beams, offering both shade and style to the unit. The slightly curved end of each beam furthers the elegant look, while caps finish each upright. This vinyl pergola contains the greatest concentration of titanium dioxide available, to fully protect it from ultraviolet sun rays. Such high quality construction ensures the structure will never yellow, rot, peel, or warp, and can be cleaned in moments by rinsing with a garden hose. Use the included anchors to secure this item in your lawn, and allow the bold white color to create a focal point. Turn your backyard into a space fit for royalty with this Queensbrook Pergola. Assembly required. Made in the USA. Twenty year limited warranty. 

Overall Dimensions: 115"W x 115"D x 96"H 
Opening Dimensions: 90"W x 80"H 
Post Dimensions: 4" x 4" 
Mounting: place included anchors in ground, place pergola legs over anchors 
Construction: vinyl 
Mfg. Warranty: 20 year limited warranty
feature_bullets: Generous pergola brings a regal look to your backyard
Flat top with slats provides shade to a 115" square area
Structure helps create an outdoor room
All vinyl construction remains durable and lovely for many seasons
Included anchors keep the pergola stable in soil

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars33 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
